类 SaveLoadManager

java.lang.Object
SaveLoadManager
public class SaveLoadManager extends Object
Provides utility methods for saving and loading the state of the game, including player, pet, and inventory information. Handles JSON serialization/deserialization using Gson, including custom adapters for LocalDateTime and polymorphic inventory items.

The class supports up to three save slots and can determine the number of existing saves or find the oldest one for replacement.

Example usage: 


 // Create a new GameState object
 GameState gameState = new GameState();

 // Save the game to slot 1
 SaveLoadManager.saveGame(gameState, 1);

 // Load the game from slot 1
 GameState loaded = SaveLoadManager.loadGame(1);

 // Get how many slots are currently occupied
 int count = SaveLoadManager.getSaveFileCounts();

作者:
Yu Li

  • 方法详细资料

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame(GameState state, int slot) throws IOException
      Saves the given GameState to the specified save slot (1–3). If creationTime is not yet set, it will be initialized and saved. The lastSavedTime is updated every time the game is saved.
      参数:
      state - GameState object containing all current game data
      slot - The save slot number (1, 2, or 3)
      抛出:
      IOException - if saving fails

    • loadGame

      public static GameState loadGame(int slot) throws IOException
      Loads a saved GameState from the given slot.
      参数:
      slot - The save slot number (1, 2, or 3)
      返回:
      GameState loaded from JSON file, or null if file doesn't exist
      抛出:
      IOException - if reading fails

    • getSaveFileCounts

      public static int getSaveFileCounts()
      Returns the number of existing save files in the saves directory. Used to determine whether a new slot is available or replacement is needed.
      返回:
      the number of existing save slots (between 0–3)

    • findOldestSlot

      public static int findOldestSlot()
      Finds the save slot (1–3) with the earliest creation time. Useful for replacing the oldest pet when all save slots are full.
      返回:
      the slot number with the oldest creation time, or -1 if none exist
